name: Home Cooked Nonsense
description:
Game made for Diverse Populations in roughly 4 months. Many of the options were focused on making the game more accessible and appeal to different target demographics.

It is a bit rough, the art is all drawn in game maker with a mouse, and there is no real sound balancing. You can, however, put on a neat hat. There are most likely bugs and other issues I didn't notice or get around to.

I wanted to make a game sort of like a combination of Wario Ware and Cooking Mama. I did really enjoy how it turned out which is why I decided to upload it. I did some fiddling to remove any barriers previously there and take away any personal information, however please let me know if you ended up finding any issues.

Only for Windows, I don't know how to export a mac file with Game Maker if you can.
